ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.LVGO_Automation_Switch__c.Validations__c = TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED(Cardio_Features_Enabled__c), ISCHANGED(Cardio_Start_Date__c) ), OR( AND( Cardio_Features_Enabled__c = TRUE, ISBLANK(Cardio_Start_Date__c) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Cardio_Start_Date__c)), Cardio_Features_Enabled__c = FALSE ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Cardio Features Enabled is checked you must enter a Cardio Start Date value. If you enter a Cardio Start Date value then you need to enable Cardio Features Enabled flag.
